review.reviewBody: I love Peking Restaurant.  The food is consistently good especially their ginger beef. Very nice family run restaurant
The Crab Meat and Fish Maw in Thick Soup is very tasty.
So gross. Everything tasted like chemicals and the "chicken" on the chicken chow mein was not meat. Idk what it was but it was foamy and limp and disgusting.
absolutely disgusting.  received credit. beef and broccoli was the worst take out I have ever had. grey cold meat. uncooked tough broccoli.  swimming in grey brown water. nasty nasty nasty.
this is the second time I have ordered fried rice (156) with no egg and it has egg in it anyway.
